mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( id, password, email, address, phone, gender, name, postcode ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{name}, #{postcode} )
mapper.select: SELECT member_no FROM member WHERE session_key = #{sessionKey} AND session_limit > now()

SELECT member_no AS "memberNo", id, password, email, address, name, postcode, phone, regdate, age, gender, app_token AS "appToken", session_id AS "sessionId", session_limit AS "sessionLimit", private_encoded AS "privateEncoded", public_encoded AS "publicEncoded" FROM member
SELECT member_no AS memberNo, id, password, email, address, phone, gender, name, postcode, regdate, state FROM member WHERE member_no = #{value}
SELECT member_no AS memberNo, id, password, email, address, phone, gender, name, postcode, regdate, state FROM member WHERE id = #{value}
SELECT member_no AS memberNo, id, password, email, address, phone, gender, name, postcode, regdate, state FROM member WHERE id = #{id} AND password = #{password}
SELECT member_no, id, password FROM member WHERE session_id = #{value} AND session_limit > SYSDATE
SELECT NAME, address, postcode, phone FROM member WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}
